testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlIntersectionSignalInventoryUpdate dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.10.10 [Need to Share Turning Movement and Intersection Data] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}
Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 5 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 6 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}
Step 9 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: Dialog=dlDeviceInformationSubscription SubscriptionMessage SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected
Step 10 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to [TRUE] then CONTINUE, Otherwise SKIP the following substeps.
Step 10.1 WHILE PUBLICATION_COMPLETE is not equal to [TRUE] then CONTINUE, Otherwise SKIP the following substeps.
Step 10.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: Dialog=dlIntersectionSignalInventoryUpdate PublicationsToReceive PublicationErrorResponseExpected PublicationErrorTypeExpected
Step 10.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to [TRUE] then CONTINUE, Otherwise SKIP the following substeps.
Step 10.1.2.1 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True
Step 10.1.2.2 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: Dialog=dlIntersectionSignalInventoryUpdate OptionalContentVerified PublicationResponseMessage
